title: Dell Restart Program
eligibility: 5+ years experience and 12+ months away from the workforce or underemployed
description: 16‑week paid returnship with training, mentorship, coaching, and potential conversion. Direct Hire path also available.

title: IBM Tech Re‑Entry Program
eligibility: 12+ months career break; paid, full‑time returnship
description: Paid, full‑time returnship for technical professionals to refresh skills via prescriptive learning and real‑world projects; pathway to full‑time at IBM.

title: Microsoft Leap Program
description: Immersive 16‑week blend of classroom learning and hands‑on engineering projects on real Microsoft teams (e.g., Azure, Xbox, Bing, Office).

title: Deloitte Return to Work Programme
eligibility: 18+ months career break; right to work in Ireland
description: Structured 9‑month paid placement with hybrid options, coaching, mentoring, and cohort support; potential permanent role upon completion.

title: Johnson & Johnson Re‑Ignite Programme
eligibility: Career break of 2+ years (varies by region)
description: Paid return‑to‑work program with onboarding, training, and on‑the‑job projects, plus mentorship and consideration for full‑time roles.

title: Amazon Returnship Program
description: 16‑week paid, benefit‑eligible virtual returnship with structured work assignments and reintegration support; potential full‑time offer based on performance.

title: Goldman Sachs Returnship
eligibility: Previously employed professionals with 2+ years out of the workforce (region‑specific criteria apply)
description: Paid 12‑week Returnship with on‑the‑job learning, mentorship, and professional development; strong performers considered for full‑time roles.

title: ReEntry Program
eligibility: 2+ years out of the workforce; experienced professionals
description: 15‑week paid fellowship (April–July) with mentorship, training, and potential conversion to a permanent role.

title: Intuit Again
eligibility: Career break; technologists returning to work
description: Supportive returnship pathway for technologists after a career break, with structured learning and mentored projects. Duration varies by cohort/location.

title: Recharge
eligibility: Experienced technologists returning after a career break
criteria: Break for caregiving or other reasons
description: Cohort-based returnship; prior cohorts have run ~20 weeks (some regions run shorter bootcamps). Includes training, real project work, and conversion potential.

title: Cisco Return-to-Work (via Women Back to Work)
eligibility: Experienced professionals returning after a career break
description: Comprehensive returnship with mentorship, workshops, and training for technical professionals returning to work after a career break.

title: HubSpot Returners Program
criteria: Interest in sales, success, operations, or tech (varies)
description: 20‑week program with training, support, and growth opportunities to help returners upskill and transition back to work; cohorts run ~2x per year.
